elements.label: Relinquishable
elements.comments: This aspect allows the element to be placed in the Relinquish verb as the primary subject.

elements.label: Not Relinquishable
elements.comments: This aspect prevents the element from being placed in the Relinquish verb as the primary subject.

elements.label: Scoutable
elements.comments: This aspect allows the element to be placed in the Scout verb as the primary subject.

elements.label: Not Scoutable
elements.comments: This aspect prevents the element from being placed in the Scout verb as the primary subject.

elements.label: Sendable
elements.description: Something I can send, or send to.
elements.comments: This aspect allows the element to be placed in the Send verb as the primary subject.

elements.label: Not Sendable
elements.description: Something I can't send, or send to.
elements.comments: This aspect prevents the element from being placed in the Send verb as the primary subject.

elements.label: Travelable
elements.comments: This aspect allows the element to be placed in the Travel verb as the primary subject.

elements.label: Not Travelable
elements.comments: This aspect prevents the element from being placed in the Travel verb as the primary subject.

elements.label: Useful
elements.comments: This aspect allows the element to be placed in the Use verb as the primary subject.

elements.label: Not Useful
elements.comments: This aspect prevents the element from being placed in the Use verb as the primary subject.
